sentence.Network_en: The dollhouse appeared in the 16 th century, primarily in Germany and Holland.
sentence.Network_cn: 玩具屋出现在16世纪, 主要是在德国和荷兰.

sentence.Network_en: But probably the most familiar form of miniaturization is the dollhouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许大家最熟悉的袖珍艺术的形式还是玩具屋吧.

sentence.Network_en: I put all of my dolls in my dollhouse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我把我所有的娃娃都放在娃娃屋里.

2. a small model of a house used as a toy by children
